title: ExtractedInstructions
description: A list of instructions extracted from a text, which may include steps or guidelines for a process. Always verify factual accuracy and guard against hallucinations or misinformation.

instruction.description: A step or instruction extracted from the text. Must be factually accurate and verified against reliable sources.

description.description: Optional clarification or explanation of the instruction. Should include source verification when applicable.

confidence.description: Confidence level in the accuracy of the instruction based on source reliability and verification.
